name: Elevator Abstract
description:
This game is the merging of the 1983 game Elevator Action with the work of Wassily Kandinsky.

Experience a prophet's journey to cleansing the world's owners

Features:

  • Music progression throughout the level
  • Abstract Elevators with peculiar art that are also controllable
  • Enlightening those that who have not yet seen the truth

This Game is a Work In Progress
